Name: El Ritmo
Ingredients: 50 ml Light gold rum (1-3 year old molasses column)
10 ml Cynar or other carciofo amaro
15 ml Cream of coconut (e.g. Coco Lopez, Re'al etc.)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Collins glass .
STRAIN into glass filled with crushed ice.
Review: Pineapple juice, lime, and coconut cream give this Legacy-winning cocktail a hint of tiki but can somewhat mask the rum, particularly when made with Bacardi Carta Blanca White Rum, as originally. Hence, a more characterful rum is recommended.
History: The Canadian Bacardí Legacy 2016 winning cocktail , created by Giancarlo Quiroz Jesus at The Diamond in Vancouver.
Nutrition: One serving of El Ritmo contains 173 calories
